Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Exhibits unusual shark repellent and surfactant properties. Forms voltage-dependent, ion-permeable channels in membranes. At high concentration causes cell membrane lysis.
Sequence Information.Domain: Consists of a C-terminal hydrophilic region and a predominantly hydrophobic remainder.

Literature.Title: Isolation, characterization and synthesis of a novel paradaxin isoform.
Literature.Author: Adermann K, Raida M, Paul Y, Abu-Raya S, Bloch-Shilderman E, Lazarovici P, Hochman J, Wellh√∂ner H.
